info.name: What do you know about the internet architecture?
info.main: Knowing the architecture is mandatory to undersanting web development, you have to know this!
info.results: You have finished! Remember, you need to answer 75% of the questions correctly to earn the badges.

questions.q: Regardless of what you think, the Shu-Ha-Ri filosofy works, but... what does it mean?

a.option: That I can do whatever I want, whenever I want.
That I need to follow the procedures exactly as said until I become confortable.
It's the sound humans make when they sneeze.
It's a martial art developed by ancient Egipcians from the north Westeros

questions.q: What are the in-class lessons meant for?

a.option: To reinforce the theory that I learned on my own
To make amazing projects and practice, practice, practice!
To catch up with everything that I have behind

questions.q: Why do you need to read by yourself?

a.option: Because it is part of the training and I will have to do it all the time after I become a developer
Because the instructor is lazy and hates to teach this stuff
Because the academy wants to hurt me
